#include <vector>
#include <list>
#include <map>
#include <set>
#include <queue>
#include <deque>
#include <stack>
#include <bitset>
#include <algorithm>
#include <functional>
#include <numeric>
#include <utility>
#include <sstream>
#include <iostream>
#include <iomanip>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cmath>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <ctime>
#include <cstring>

using namespace std;

#define vi vector<int>
#define vii vector< vector<int> >
#define ii pair<int,int>
#define pb push_back
#define FOR(i,j,k) for(int i = (j) ; i <= (k) ; i++ )
#define FORN(i,j,k) for(int i = (j) ; i >= (k) ;i--)
#define FORI(xx,x,it) for(xx::iterator it = x.begin() ; it != x.end() ; it++)
#define FORNI(xx,x,it) for(xx::reverse_iterator it = x.rbegin() ; it != x.rend() ; it++)
#define si size()
#define MAX 10000007

int dp[7][100000];

int decode(int i,int &run,int &ball,int &wic) {

	if(i == 0) {
		run = 0;
		ball = 1;
		wic = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 1) {
		run = 1;
		ball = 1;
		wic = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 2) {
		run = 2;
		ball = 1;
		wic = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 3) {
		run = 3;
		ball = 1;
		wic = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 4) {
		run = 4;
		ball = 1;
		wic = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 5) {
		run = 6;
		ball = 1;
		wic = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 6) {
		run = 1;
		ball = 0;
		wic = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 7) {
		run = 2;
		ball = 0;
		wic = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 8) {
		run = 3;
		ball = 0;
		wic = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 9) {
		run = 5;
		ball = 0;
		wic = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 10) {
		run = 1;
		ball = 0;
		wic = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 11) {
		run = 2;
		ball = 0;
		wic = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 12) {
		run = 5;
		ball = 0;
		wic = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 13) {
		run = 7;
		ball = 0;
		wic = 0;
	}
	else if(i == 14) {
		run = 0;
		ball = 1;
		wic = 1;
	}
}

int calc(int balls, int runs) {
	if(balls > 6 || runs <= 0)
		return 1;

	if(dp[balls][runs]) 
		return dp[balls][runs];
	
	long long ans = 0;

	int run,ball,wic;
	
	FOR(i,0,14) {
		decode(i,run,ball,wic);

		if(wic)
			ans = (ans+1) %  MAX;

		ans += calc(balls+ball,runs-run);
		ans %= MAX;
	}

	dp[balls][runs] = ans;

	return ans;
}

int main() {
	int t;
	int run;

	cin >> t;

	FOR(i,1,t) {
		cin >> run;
		cout << "Case " << i << ": ";
		cout << calc(1,run);
		cout << endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
